trans-unit.source: Implements an ASP.NET handler that forwards requests to the remoting HTTP channel.
trans-unit.target: Implementa um processador do ASP.NET que reencaminha os pedidos para o canal de comunicação remota HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Custom HTTP handlers process specific, predefined types of HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: Os processadores HTTP personalizados processam tipos específicos, predefinidos de pedidos de HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Executable code defined in the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> classes, rather than conventional ASP or ASP.NET Web pages, responds to these specific requests.
trans-unit.target: Código executável definido no <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>classes, em vez de páginas Web de ASP.NET ou ASP convencionais, responder a estes pedidos específicos.</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>

trans-unit.source: HTTP handlers provide a way of interacting with the low-level request and response services of the IIS Web server, and provide functionality similar to ISAPI extensions but with a simpler programming model.
trans-unit.target: Processadores HTTP fornece uma forma de interagir com os serviços de resposta do servidor Web do IIS e o pedido de baixo nível e fornecer a funcionalidade semelhante a extensões ISAPI, mas com um modelo de programação mais simples.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"> </xref> classe com valores predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"> </xref> classe com valores predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether another request can use the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booleano que indica se o outro pedido pode utilizar o <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for all instances of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para todas as instâncias <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Enables processing of HTTP Web requests by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Permite o processamento de pedidos de HTTP Web por instância atual.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> methods, see <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>métodos, consulte <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref>) used to service HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> que fornece referências aos objetos intrínsecos do servidor (por exemplo, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""> </xref>, e <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""> </xref>) utilizado para pedidos HTTP de serviço.
